data.comment: The big names in today's match at American Express Community Stadium have now been confirmed.
The match has started at American Express Community Stadium.
In the minute 1, Brighton to take a throw-in in West Bromwich territory.
In Falmer West Bromwich drive forward through Grady Diangana. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for West Bromwich in their own half.
In the minute 5, Free kick for West Bromwich in their own half.
Can Brighton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in West Bromwich's half?
Brighton's Dan Burn has run offside.
In the minute 8, Throw-in Brighton.
Brighton have a goal kick.
Free kick Brighton.
In the minute 9, Free kick for Brighton in the half of West Bromwich.
Can Brighton capitalize from this throw-in deep inside West Bromwich's half?
Brighton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 12, Goal kick for West Bromwich at American Express Community Stadium.
West Bromwich's Karlan Ahearne-Grant breaks free at American Express Community Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Falmer.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for West Bromwich at American Express Community Stadium.
Throw-in for West Bromwich in the half of Brighton.
Neal Maupay for Brighton is whistled offside.
In the minute 16, Jon Moss signals a Brighton throw-in in West Bromwich's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Falmer a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 19, Brighton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Jon Moss signals a free kick to West Bromwich.
In the minute 21, Jon Moss signals a free kick to West Bromwich in their own half.
Can Brighton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in West Bromwich's half?
Neal Maupay for Brighton drives towards goal at American Express Community Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 27, Corner awarded to Brighton.
Throw-in for Brighton close to the penalty box.
Jon Moss awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 30, Brighton have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
Brighton's Yves Bissouma is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in for West Bromwich in the half of Brighton.
In the minute 33, Brighton have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
West Bromwich needs to be cautious. Brighton have an attacking throw-in.
Ball safe as West Bromwich is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 35, Brighton's Adam Lallana gets in a shot on goal at American Express Community Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Brighton to take a throw-in in West Bromwich territory.
Throw-in high up the field for West Bromwich in Falmer.
In the minute 38, Grady Diangana for West Bromwich gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Brighton goal kick.
Jon Moss signals a Brighton throw-in in West Bromwich's half.
In the minute 40, It's now 1-0 thanks to an own goal from Jake Livermore.
Free kick West Bromwich.
Brighton's Tariq Lamptey has been booked in Falmer.
In the minute 43, Throw-in Brighton.
Throw-in for Brighton at American Express Community Stadium.
Jon Moss signals a throw-in for West Bromwich, close to Brighton's area.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for West Bromwich in the half of Brighton.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at American Express Community Stadium.
Ball safe as West Bromwich is awarded a throw-in in their half.
West Bromwich to take a throw-in in Brighton territory.
In the minute 49, Grady Diangana gets his shot on target but fails to score for West Bromwich.
Brighton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can West Bromwich get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brighton's half?
In the minute 51, Neal Maupay of Brighton smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Jon Moss signals a Brighton throw-in in West Bromwich's half.
In the minute 53, Jon Moss awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Brighton to take a throw-in in West Bromwich territory.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for West Bromwich in their own half.
Jon Moss signals a free kick to Brighton.
Corner awarded to Brighton.
Jon Moss awards West Bromwich a goal kick.
In the minute 62, Graham Potter (Brighton) is making a first substitution, with Pascal Gross replacing Adam Lallana.
Jon Moss signals a West Bromwich throw-in in Brighton's half.
In the minute 63, The away team replace Jake Livermore with Callum Robinson.
Slaven Bilic is making the team's second substitution at American Express Community Stadium with Kyle Edwards replacing Grady Diangana.
Jon Moss awards Brighton a goal kick.
In the minute 66, Goal kick for Brighton at American Express Community Stadium.
Throw-in for West Bromwich at American Express Community Stadium.
West Bromwich drives forward and Conor Townsend gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 69, West Bromwich have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
Jon Moss signals a free kick to West Bromwich in their own half.
Alexis MacAllister is replacing Solly March for Brighton at American Express Community Stadium.
In the minute 72, West Bromwich awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for West Bromwich in the half of Brighton.
Throw-in Brighton.
In the minute 74, West Bromwich awarded a throw-in in their own half.
West Bromwich have a goal kick.
Free kick for West Bromwich in their own half.
In the minute 77, Adam Webster (Brighton) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Falmer.
In Falmer a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 79, Steven Alzate is replacing Leandro Trossard for the home team.
Brighton have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Brighton.
In the minute 81, Ball goes out of play for a West Bromwich goal kick.
Goal! West Bromwich go level at 1-1 through Karlan Ahearne-Grant in Falmer.
West Bromwich are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 85, Corner awarded to Brighton.
Matt Phillips is on a sub for Karlan Ahearne-Grant for West Bromwich.
Ball safe as Brighton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 87, Jon Moss awards Brighton a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Falmer.
Free kick for Brighton in their own half.
Throw-in for Brighton in their own half.
Brighton awarded a free kick in their own half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Brighton needs to be cautious. West Bromwich have an attacking throw-in.
West Bromwich have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
In Falmer West Bromwich attack through Matt Phillips. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Brighton goal kick.
That's full-time at American Express Community Stadium. The final score is 1-1.
